revised_title: The Influence of Temperature on the Biological Action of Light
tldr: This article investigates the effects of temperature on the biological action of light, specifically the role of temperature in sunlight therapy and the bactericidal action of light. The authors discuss various experiments and findings related to the influence of temperature on the body's response to sunlight, as well as the effects of different wavelengths of light on microorganisms and biological photochemical reactions. The study highlights the importance of understanding the relationship between temperature and light in the context of health and biology.
